definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
facing a powerful enemy (idiom); fig. confronting grave difficulties/Enemy at the Gates, 1991 movie by Jean-Jacques Annaud

sentences.english: Context is the most frequently studied theme in pragmatics.
sentences.chinese: 语境是当前语用学研究的一个热点。

sentences.english: The existing vaccines can only reduce the amount of virus, rather than totally inactivating it.
sentences.chinese: 当前的疫苗只会减少病毒数量，并非真正杀灭病毒。

sentences.english: As you can see, there are some consequences with the current arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 正如您所看到的，当前这种安排还存有许多问题。

sentences.english: The financial restraint in rural areas is one of the bottlenecked factors in current new rural construction.
sentences.chinese: 农村金融抑制是当前新农村建设问题的瓶颈因素之一。

sentences.english: However, the present recognition of TV essays still remains on the text-oriented level.
sentences.chinese: 但当前对电视散文的认识仍然停留在文本主导论层次。

sentences.english: Adds a sequence of connected cubic Bzier curves to the current figure.
sentences.chinese: 在当前图形中添加一系列相互连接的立方贝塞尔曲线。

sentences.english: Each plug-in has access to information about a personâ ™s current location whereabouts. The location information includes
sentences.chinese: 各插件都可访问关于某人当前位置所在的信息。

sentences.english: The rotating sphere shows the current pitch and bank angles.
sentences.chinese: 旋转的球体表示了当前的俯仰角和坡度角。

sentences.english: The rapid development of the present vocational colleges calls for the 2nd-level management in schools or departments.
sentences.chinese: 院系二级管理是当前高职院校迅速发展的需要。

sentences.english: To narrate is to give an account of what happened or is happening.
sentences.chinese: 记叙文讲述的是发生在当前或过去事情的经过。

sentences.english: Development and ecology are two main theme in urban design and construction in Beijing nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 发展与生态是当前北京城市建设的两大突出主题。

sentences.english: Make the directory containing the files the current working directory.
sentences.chinese: 将包含这些文件的目录作为当前工作目录。

sentences.english: The domestic caustic soda production techniques by diaphragm method and ion-exchange membrane method at present are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了当前国内隔膜法和离子膜法烧碱的生产技术。

sentences.english: He can cope with the present situation.
sentences.chinese: 他能够应付当前的局势。

sentences.english: Eutrophication is becoming a serious problem in most of the mariculture areas in China.
sentences.chinese: 当前，中国的多数海水养殖区富营养化相当严重。

sentences.english: How to develop the economy of tax fund is a new problem now.
sentences.chinese: 如何培育地方税源经济是当前的新课题。

definition: immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
near in time/in the near future/very soon/recent
to be in (some state, position, or condition)
to be situated at/to find oneself at
